title: Being 100-0 from something out of stealth sure is fun and exciting
body:
{{champion:28}} {{champion:107}} 
Was playing ashe last game vs a full ap eve......... i bought banshee 2nd item she blue smited it off an still killed me in the back =[ i felt there was nothing at all i could do to survive her damage, and even when she failed to kill me karthus ult finished the job. i ended up with a banshee and a ga by the end of the game it took about 70 mins for them to win cause they had no tanks but i racked up 21 deaths while playing safe as i could near a pink ward+ having 2 defensive items. her damage was just beyond stupid.
